tool.name: SoilMoisture

param.name: Output_folder
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and folder name where output from this tool will be stored.

param.name: Input_shapefile
param.displayname: Input soil shapefile with water content information
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename where the input shapefile is located. This should contain fields containg volumetric water content at the thresholds below: field capacity, permanent wilting point, and saturation.

param.name: Field_FieldCapacity
param.displayname: Field containing water content (vol) for field capacity
param.dialogReference: Specify the name of the field within the input shapefile that contains the volumetric water content for field capacity.

param.name: Field_PWP
param.displayname: Field containing water content (vol) for permanent wilting point
param.dialogReference: Specify the name of the field within the input shapefile that contains the volumetric water content for permanent wilting point.

param.name: Field_Saturation
param.displayname: Field containing water content (vol) for saturation
param.dialogReference: Specify the name of the field within the input shapefile that contains the volumetric water content for saturation.

param.name: Calculate_RAW_choice
param.expression: Fraction | Field containing WC (vol) at critical point
param.dialogReference:
Calculate readily-available water using an option from the dropdown below:

  • Fraction: using a fraction of PAW

  • Field containing WC (vol) at critical point: using a field containing water content information a critical point

param.name: RAW_fraction
param.displayname: Readily-available water fraction of plant available water
param.dialogReference: Specify the fraction of PAW that will be used to calculate the RAW.

param.name: Field_Critical_Point
param.displayname: Field containing water content (vol) for critical point
param.dialogReference: If the water content at the critical point is known, specify the field name containg this information.

param.name: Calculate_mm
param.displayname: Calculate water content (mm) using rooting depth below?

param.name: Rooting_depth
param.dialogReference: Specify the rooting depth (mm) that will be used to calculate the water content in mm.

tool.summary: This tool calculates volumetric soil moisture content at different thresholds (plant available water, readily-available water, drainable water, total water content). If rooting depth is specified, it will calculate the soil moisture in millimetres (mm).

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool calculates volumetric soil moisture content at different thresholds (plant available water, readily-available water, drainable water, total water content). If rooting depth is specified, it will calculate the soil moisture in millimetres (mm).
